title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.9 - Feedwater connections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.9 - Feedwater connections

State Regulations

Feedwater connections shall be independent of any water
gage connections. Feedwater connections for cast iron steam boilers, when
introduced from a pressure line, shall be made to the condensate return line or
the reservoir of the condensate return pump, not directly to the boiler. There
shall be a check valve in the feedwater line at the boiler for all
boilers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-5.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
